img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(48\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5e/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2848%29.png)
Unfortunately, it won't be very long until lots of lightning starts to appear around the Rhino. When this happens, it will rear up and more lightning will start to strike the ground all around the field. This means that the horn is about to regrow, and you'll need to prepare to break it again.
img_below_text:
Beyond this, expect attacks where it will charge at you. There are rocks you can use in the arena to hide behind for a little while. However, once these are destroyed, you'll need to dodge out of the way. When it's close to you, it will also try to swipe at you by pulling its head back, then swinging it to the side to catch you with its horn. These are great moves to dodge and build up focus if you've unlocked the ability to do so in the skills tab.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(47\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2847%29.png)

Unfortunately, it won't be very long until lots of lightning starts to appear around the Rhino. When this happens, it will rear up and more lightning will start to strike the ground all around the field. This means that the horn is about to regrow, and you'll need to prepare to break it again."
        - Following Text: "Beyond this, expect attacks where it will charge at you. There are rocks you can use in the arena to hide behind for a little while. However, once these are destroyed, you'll need to dodge out of the way. When it's close to you, it will also try to swipe at you by pulling its head back, then swinging it to the side to catch you with its horn. These are great moves to dodge and build up focus if you've unlocked the ability to do so in the skills tab.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(47\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2847%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a battle scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, featuring the player character engaging a large, lightning-infused Rhino-like creature in a grassy, rocky arena. The creature's glowing horn suggests it is regenerating, aligning with the preceding text's description of the horn regrowth phase. The surrounding environment includes rocks that can be used for cover, as mentioned in the following text, emphasizing the strategic elements of the fight.
